channel.title: Tutorial on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration

item.title: OSLC Primer
item.description: It has become commonplace that specifications are precise in their details but difficult to read and understand unless you already know the basic concepts. A good solution to this problem is to write a companion document called a primer, designed to be read first, whose goal is to explain the concepts while leaving precise details to the specification. This document is the primer for the OSLC Core Specification Version 2.
